name: utterances
description: A lightweight comments widget built on GitHub issues.

scripts.start: parcel src/utterances.html --no-hmr --public-url / --port 4000 & parcel watch src/client.ts & parcel watch src/index.html & parcel watch src/authorized.html
scripts.build: parcel build src/utterances.html && parcel build src/client.ts && parcel build src/index.html && parcel build src/authorized.html
scripts.predeploy: yarn run build && cp .nojekyll dist/ && cp CNAME dist/
scripts.postinstall: cd node_modules/parcel-bundler && yarn install && yarn build && cd ../..
